body.p:
Brooks L & N R R
15th June '62
To His Excellency
Gov Magoffin

My old friend & Neighbour Rev Geo Rogers comes to you with a petition in favor of his son, he will present all the facts of his case which I believe ^fully^ Entitle him to Executive clemency. I am entirely satisfied that the boy has been dealt hardly & unjustly with & if not inconsistint with your own conclusions after a review of the case I would be glad if you would Exercise one of the powers of which a Constitutional? Legislature failed to deprive you

Permit me now Govr to add that you have here & Everywhere in the state
firm & devoted friends, whom you have grappled to you with hooks of steel by your conservatism, consistency, & firmness, any one of whom will repay for the sloughing off of a host of time-, who are allways ready with the pliant hinges of the knee.

As Ever sincerely & with great respect
Jno. O. Harrison
